title: Charles Barkley, Kevin Durant, Antonio Brown, Patriots, and Odell Beckham Jr.
itunes:title: Charles Barkley, Kevin Durant, Antonio Brown, Patriots, and Odell Beckham Jr.
description:
Colin discusses Charles Barkley's recent comments on the state of the NBA, why he feels F Kevin Durant will stay with the Golden State Warriors, why Pittsburgh Steelers WR Antonio Brown is making a mistake, and why it's possible the New England Patriots might get New York Giants WR Odell Beckham Jr.. Guests include Doug Gottlieb, Rob Parker, C. J. Anderson, and Cuttino Mobley.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
